casebody.data:
Second Department,

August, 1951.

(August 16, 1951.) In the Matter of the Application of George C. Hanold et al., Appellants, for an Order Removing the Criminal Action in which They Are Defendants from the County Court, Kings County, to the Supreme Court of the State of New York, Kings County. District Attorney, Kings County, Respondent.

Motion for a stay of trial denied, without costs. Motion to dismiss appeal granted, without costs, and appeal dismissed, without costs. (Matter of Newman [People], 278 App. Div. 857; People v. Perito, 272 App. Div. 823.) Present — Nolan, P. J., Adel, Sneed, Wenzel and MaeCrate, JJ.
